item.title: Super Weapons Ice Gun
item.author: invalid@example.com (SamMaster)
item.dc:creator: SamMaster
item.content:encoded:
Started it this week, thanks to Postal, and its going along pretty good. Making primary shoot ice shards that will slow down the target and maybe get it to stick to walls. Alt fire shoots some ice orb that quickly becomes a big ice chuck that crushes those that touch it if it goes too fast and it can get pushed by projectiles, vehicles, and players.

Right now the ice chuck works well. It just needs some tweeking. I'll have to work on the ice shard effects afterwards, then start on the...

Super Weapons Ice Gun

item.title: Scram Cannon 2k4
item.author: invalid@example.com (Neuroflare)
item.dc:creator: Neuroflare
item.content:encoded:
[edit] The Gun has been uploaded as 2 zip files containing 2 split rar files. To extract you must put both contained RAR files into the SAME folder and open the file labelled [nfScramCannon.part01.rar]. You will then be able to extract the files. To get winrar (or another rar extractor if you use other platforms) if you don't have it go to http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

Scram Cannon files are attached to this post. Happy...

Scram Cannon 2k4

item.title: YARM
item.author: invalid@example.com (Postal)
item.dc:creator: Postal
item.content:encoded:
Quoted from Atari Forums
http://www.ataricommunity.com/forums/showthread.php?s=&postid=5954945#post5954945

Yet Another Real-life Mod [alpha][pics][DL]
Name: Y.A.R.M.
Version: 104
Compatibility: UT2004 (patch 3339)
Description: Yet Another Real-life Mod. Semi Realistic weapon and player pack. Players choose between six classes to fight as: Sniper, Recon, Infantry, Demolition, Spy, and Assault. Each class has different speeds and health statistics as well as starting...

YARM

item.title: Gravity Gun
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dragonfly_of_Forgery)
item.dc:creator: Dragonfly_of_Forgery
item.content:encoded:
Update 17-12-04

  • Things are improved.
  • Subtle things.
  • There is still a noticable bug where flag carring bots will think they should be gravjumping back where they came from instead of on towards home. When this happens, they will not do very well.

I'm calling this one .91 because you have to start somewhere.

Update 13-12-04 (NZ time!)

My current update goes like this:

  • Pulling is done every frame Tick, so it's silky smooth, like silk.
  • The...

Gravity Gun

item.title: [2k4] Snowball
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kangus)
item.dc:creator: Kangus
item.content:encoded:
early alpha of a snowball... give it a try and give me feedback. Keep me coding!
It still needs an alt fire among other things.
Props to Wong for the awesome impact emitter.

[update since a2]
changed the way the damage works... now its relative to velocity, not crappy radius.
alt now scoops up more ammo while standing on snow or ice.
tweaked lots of other variables
probably other crap.

[Update]
fixed a few things Smoke pointed out to me.

item.title: Pain2K4a3
item.author: invalid@example.com (Smoke39)
item.dc:creator: Smoke39
item.content:encoded:
Pain2K4a4

Pain2K4 a5! :O
This is still needed, if you don't already have it.

Lots of new junk since the last version. I can't remember what it all is. Read the last few posts of mine to figure it out. Lots of general improvements and a few new weapons. Sniper shotgun uses the same ammo and damage type as the quad shot, which I may change. Izu jumps to...

Pain2K4a3

item.title: Another SSP update, now with more PCP! KILL YOUR PARENTS!!!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (EvilDrWong)
item.dc:creator: EvilDrWong
item.content:encoded:
Here's a quick cut and paste from the readme. It not only describes the single coolest mutator ever, but it will get you so amped up to play it you will seriously kick your mom straight in the FACE!

SSP Readme said:
The Species Stats Plus Three Step Program to Success is finally here! Impress your friends, startle your relatives, and woo your lovers with this simple and effective wealth building program! No money down cash exchanges, day trading, real estate, this program HAS IT ALL!...
Click to expand...
Another SSP update, now with more PCP! KILL YOUR PARENTS!!!!!

item.title: HardCore v1.9
item.author: invalid@example.com (Postal)
item.dc:creator: Postal
item.content:encoded:
No its not porn, :-(

Bascly its a wimpy verson of some of these tweeking mutes, but insted of adjusting global variables, it allows you to adjust humans and bots seperatly. Want all the humans to deal out 10x damage, and the bots do .1x, you can.
Etc, its realy simple, but still needs a couple of tweeks to the config menu, so this is verson 1.9

item.title: Aliens APC
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Ok here is the APC I have been working on
[SCREENSHOT]http://www.uskaarj.com/APC.jpg[/SCREENSHOT]

The back turret is animated I only need someone to help me code it so the back turret activates live the lev does.

let me know what you guys think.

once this baby is coded I will do a nice skin for it.

item.title: Mean Minigun
item.author: invalid@example.com (Postal)
item.dc:creator: Postal
item.content:encoded: Allright, theres no mute, so you will need to use arena or WoRM. This is a beefed up minigun with a zoom altfire and recoil. Basicly I set the minigun to have the damage and accuracy of the minigun turret. This rocks in ONS and Invasion.

item.title: Half Cocked - A cheap AQ2 ripoff for UT2k3
item.author: invalid@example.com (EvilDrWong)
item.dc:creator: EvilDrWong
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, I think its ready to be played by someone other than me. Tell me if it sucks. If it doesnt, well... thats great, but Id rather know what you think sucks. Sadly, since the attachment size limit is 500k (and the file is an .ace) i cant attach it, so youll have to PM me so i can email it to you (make sure youve got ~810k free in your inbox. 'Upgrade' builds will be smaller since i wont have to include textures or meshes)

Sorry to be so protective about it, but it contains some shady...

Half Cocked - A cheap AQ2 ripoff for UT2k3

item.title: NVG's
item.author: invalid@example.com (Postal)
item.dc:creator: Postal
item.content:encoded: This was origional part of TD, but I whent and pulled it out so it can be used seperatly. Here is a NVG mute. Just make sure to bind the on/off key before you start youre match.
